AtlasInterface.name: Standard

Component.classes: Panel windowTitleText ScrollBar geogExplorerPanel Tree popUpWindow
Component.name: Geography Explorer
Component.Description: The geography explorer component of the report.

Property.description: Show title bar
Property.name: Show Title Bar?

Property.description: The title of the geography explorer
Property.name: Title

Property.description: If being used as a pop up window is it visible at start up? Use 'toggleGeogExplorer' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window Visible?

Property.description: Is the explorer a pop up window? Use 'toggleGeogExplorer' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: Should the explorer close after a selection?
Property.name: Close On Selection?

Component.classes: Panel windowTitleText ScrollBar dataExplorerPanel Tree popUpWindow
Component.name: Data Explorer
Component.Description: The data explorer component of the report.

Property.description: Show title bar
Property.name: Show Title Bar?

Property.description: The title of the data explorer
Property.name: Title

Property.description: If being used as a pop up window is it visible at start up? Use 'toggleDataExplorer' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window Visible?

Property.description: Is the explorer a pop up window? Use 'toggleDataExplorer' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: Should the explorer close after a selection?
Property.name: Close On Selection?

Property.description: Should the explorer data be expanded?
Property.name: Expand Data?

Property.description: Should the explorer include dates? Set reverseDates to true to use latest date
Property.name: Include Dates?

Property.description: Should the explorer display dates in reverse order?
Property.name: Reverse Date Order?

Component.classes: Panel windowTitleText ScrollBar filterExplorerPanel Tree popUpWindow
Component.name: Filter Explorer
Component.Description: The filter explorer component of the report.

Property.description: Show title bar
Property.name: Show Title Bar?

Property.description: The title of the filter explorer
Property.name: Title

Property.description: If being used as a pop up window is it visible at start up? Use 'toggleFilterExplorer' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window Visible?

Property.description: Is the explorer a pop up window? Use 'toggleFilterExplorer' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: Should the explorer close after a selection?
Property.name: Close On Selection?

Property.description: Should the explorer data be expanded?
Property.name: Expand Data?

Property.description: Should the map attempt to zoom to a contextual area matching the filter?
Property.name: Zoom To Filter?

Component.classes: Panel windowTitleText ScrollBar mapPanel map mapText mapControl MapTip toolMenu baseLayer contextualLayer1 contextualLayer2 contextualLayer3 contextualLayer4 contextualLayer5 contextualLayer6 contextualLayer7 contextualLayer8 contextualLayer9 contextualLayer10
Component.name: Map
Component.Description: The map component of the report.

Property.description: Show title bar
Property.name: Show Title Bar?

Property.description: The title of the map
Property.name: Title

Property.description: If being used as a pop up window is it visible at start up? Use 'toggleMap' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window Visible?

Property.description: Is the map a pop up window? Use 'toggleMap' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: The maximum amount a user can zoom in as a percentage of the full extents of the map
Property.name: Max Zoom Allowed

Property.description: The data for the base layer
Property.name: Base Layer Data

Property.description: The map selection mode
Property.name: Map Select

Property.description: The time for the map zoom animation (in seconds), set to 0 for no animation
Property.name: Animation Duration (seconds)

Property.description: Does the map include a tool bar
Property.name: Map Toolbar

Property.description: Does the map include a menu button
Property.name: Map Menu Button

Property.description: Any map copyright text
Property.name: Map Copyright

Property.description: Copyright position
Property.name: Map Copyright Position

Property.description: Should the background mapping be switched on at start up?
Property.name: Show Background Mapping?

Property.description: If true, only show one 'background mapping' button in the layer list. If false, show one button per background layer.
Property.name: Single Background Mapping Button?

Property.description: The label for the 'toggle background mapping' checkbox
Property.name: Background Mapping Label

Property.description: The path to any background images
Property.name: Background Folder

Property.description: Should the map pre-load all contextual vector layers at startup, or wait for the user to click on the relevant button?
Property.name: Pre-load Contextual Layers?

Property.description: Which contextual layers should be visible? These layers will be automatically loaded even if 'Pre-load Contextual Layers' is set to false
Property.name: Visible Contextual Layers List

Property.description: Are the contextual and background layers displayed in the legend?
Property.name: Show Layers In Legend

Property.description: Which layers should display tips?
Property.name: List Of Layers Displaying Tips

Property.description: Which layers should display labels?
Property.name: List Of Layers Displaying Labels

Property.description: Values between which labels should be displayed as a percentage of the starting map width eg '100-0,75-25,25-10'
Property.name: List Of Display Ranges For labelled Layers

Property.description: Which contextual layers should be displayed in the legend?
Property.name: Contextual Layers Displayed In Legend

Property.description: The data tip
Property.name: Tip

Component.classes: Panel windowTitleText ScrollBar timeSeriesPanel timeSeries timeSeriesYAxis timeSeriesXAxis timeSeriesGridLines chartAxisTitles DataTip chartDataUnavailableText
Component.name: Time Series Chart
Component.Description: The time series component of the report.

Property.description: Show title bar
Property.name: Show Title Bar?

Property.description: The title of the chart
Property.name: Title

Property.description: If being used as a pop up window is it visible at start up? Use 'toggleTimeSeries' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window Visible?

Property.description: Is the chart a pop up window? Use 'toggleTimeSeries' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: The data for the y-axis
Property.name: Y-Axis Data

Property.description: The label for the x-axis
Property.name: X-Axis Label

Property.description: The label for the y-axis
Property.name: Y-Axis Label

Property.description: Should the comparison data be displayed if available?
Property.name: Show Comparison Data

Property.description: Should the chart data be constrained to the current data range, or always start at zero?
Property.name: Match Y Axis to Data?

Property.description: The maximum number of time series that can be displayed at any one time
Property.name: Max No Series

Component.name: Pie Chart
Component.Description: The pie chart component of the report.

Property.description: Show title bar
Property.name: Show Title Bar?

Property.description: The title of the chart
Property.name: Title

Property.description: If being used as a pop up window is it visible at start up? Use 'togglePieChart' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window Visible?

Property.description: Is the chart a pop up window? Use 'togglePieChart' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: Is the chart selectable?
Property.name: Chart Select

Property.description: Is the chart highlightable?
Property.name: Chart Highlight

Property.description: The time for the chart data change animation (in seconds), set to 0 for no animation
Property.name: Animation Duration (seconds)

Table.classes: Panel windowTitleText ScrollBar tablePanel table tableColumnHeaders
Table.name: Table
Table.Description: The table component of the report.

Property.description: Show title bar
Property.name: Show Title Bar?

Property.description: The title of the table
Property.name: Title

Property.description: If being used as a pop up window is it visible at start up? Use 'toggleTable' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window Visible?

Property.description: Is the table a pop up window? Use 'toggleTable' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: The table selection mode
Property.name: Table Select

Property.description: The name of the table column which will be sorted
Property.name: Sort Column Name

Property.description: Sort the table data ascending / descending
Property.name: Sort Direction

Property.description: Should the end user be allowed to sort columns
Property.name: Allow User Sorting?

Property.description: The height of each cell or row in the table
Property.name: Cell Height

Property.description: Should the table show legend colours in the rows
Property.name: Show Row Colours?

Component.classes: Panel windowTitleText ScrollBar legendPanel legend legendLabels
Component.name: Legend
Component.Description: The legend that shows the user information about the classification used by the components.

Property.description: Show title bar
Property.name: Show Title Bar?

Property.description: The title of the legend
Property.name: Title

Property.description: If being used as a pop up window is it visible at start up? Use 'toggleLegend' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window Visible?

Property.description: Is the legend a pop up window? Use 'toggleLegend' to toggle visibility.
Property.name: PopUp Window?

Property.description: Is the legend selectable?
Property.name: Legend Select

Property.description: Is the legend highlightable?
Property.name: Legend Highlight

Property.description: The classification type to start the report with - one of 'equalInterval', 'quantile', 'natural', 'continuous' or 'standardDeviation'
Property.name: Classification Type

Property.description: Should the legend always be constrained between two fixed values, or not?
Property.name: Use Legend Min and Max?

Property.description: A fixed minimum value for the legend
Property.name: Legend Minimum

Property.description: A fixed maximum value for the legend
Property.name: Legend Maximum

Property.description: The size that will be used for legend symbols
Property.name: Symbol Size

Property.description: Does the legend use proportional symbols for points
Property.name: Point Proportional Symbols

Property.description: The smallest point size that will be used when displaying proportional symbols
Property.name: Point Symbol Min Size

Property.description: The largest point size that will be used when displaying proportional symbols
Property.name: Point Symbol Max Size

Property.description: The custom classifier property. The custom classifier property value contains one of 'equalInterval', 'quantile', 'natural', 'continuous' or 'standardDeviation'
Property.name: Custom Classifier Property Id

Property.description: The custom colours property. The custom colours property value contains a semi-colon delimited list of colours of the form '#ffff00;rgb(155,234,100);#0000ff'
Property.name: Custom Colours Property Id

Property.description: The custom breaks property. The custom breaks property value contains a semi-colon delimited list of values of the form '0;10;20;80'
Property.name: Custom Breaks Property Id

Property.description: The custom labels property. The custom labels property value contains a semi-colon delimited list of labels of the form 'high;medium;low'
Property.name: Custom Labels Property Id

Property.description: The custom palette property. The custom palette property value contains a reference to a palette.
Property.name: Custom Palette Property Id

Property.description: The print preview title
Property.name: Window Title

Property.description: The print preview 'Print full screen' option
Property.name: Print Full Screen

Property.description: The print preview 'print' button text
Property.name: Print Button

Property.name: Vector Text

Property.name: Bitmap Text

Property.description: The print preview 'show images' text
Property.name: Show Images Text

Property.description: The print preview 'show text' text
Property.name: Show Text Text

Property.name: Show Background Text

Property.description: The print preview 'resize' text
Property.name: Resize Text

Property.description: The print preview 'rescale' text
Property.name: Rescale Text

Property.description: The print 'error' text
Property.name: Print Error Text

Property.description: The export windows title

Property.description: The export windows 'Export full screen' option

Property.name: Save As JPEG Text

Property.name: Save As PNG Text

Property.name: Export Button

Property.name: Export Error Text

Property.description: The text windows title
Property.name: Window Title

Property.name: Add Button

Property.name: Remove Button

Property.description: The text windows 'add' button text
Property.name: Add Button

Property.description: The text windows 'remove' button text
Property.name: Remove Button

Property.description: Allow the user to edit the legend?
Property.name: Include Legend Editor Button?

Property.description: Is the base layer tick checkbox displayed?
Property.name: Include Base Layer Checkbox?

Property.description: Does the legend editor include a classifier menu?

Property.name: No Classes Text

Property.name: Classifier Text

Property.name: Palette Text

Property.name: Reverse Palette Text

Property.description: The legend editors 'minimum point size' text
Property.name: Minimum Point Size Text

Property.description: The legend editors 'maximum point size' text
Property.name: Maximum Point Size Text

Property.description: The 'Equal Interval' text
Property.name: Equal Interval Text

Property.description: The 'Quantile' text
Property.name: Quantile Text

Property.name: Natural Break Text

Property.description: Should the components show a control bar?
Property.name: Show All Component Controls?

Property.description: Should the components control bar only be visible when the mouse is hovered over it?
Property.name: Visible On Mouse Hover?

Property.description: Should the components show a drag button?
Property.name: Show Drag Button?

Property.description: Should the components show a resize button?
Property.name: Show Resize Button?

Property.description: Should the components show a close button?
Property.name: Show Close Button?

Property.description: Can the user resize the components by dragging the edges?
Property.name: Allow Resize?

Property.description: Can the user drag the component?
Property.name: Allow Drag?

Property.description: The text for the 'drag' button tip
Property.name: Drag Tip

Property.description: The text for the 'maximise' button tip
Property.name: Maximise Tip

Property.description: The text for the 'restore down' button tip
Property.name: Restore Down Tip

Property.description: The text for the 'close' button tip
Property.name: Close Tip

Property.description: The data to be used for all chart sorting
Property.name: Chart Sort Data

Property.description: Sort all chart data ascending / descending
Property.name: Chart Sort Direction

Property.description: The locale used for formatting numbers, e.g. 'en' for English, 'es' for Spanish, 'fr' for French
Property.name: Locale

Property.description: The number of decimal places to be shown for precision data in tables and tips. Set to -1 to disable
Property.name: Table Decimal Places

Property.description: The number of decimal places to be shown for precision data in legends. Set to -1 to disable
Property.name: Legend Decimal Places

Property.description: The text displayed for features that have 'No Data' or null values
Property.name: No Data Value

Property.description: A fixed width for the Atlas. Minimum width recommended is 800. Set to -1 to stretch to fit screen.
Property.name: Fixed Width

Property.description: A fixed height for the Atlas. Minimum height recommended is 600. Set to -1 to stretch to fit screen.
Property.name: Fixed Height

Property.description: A background image for the report. This image does not scale
Property.name: Background Image

Property.description: Include 'Clear Selection' in context menu?
Property.name: Clear Selection?

Property.description: Include 'Clear Comparison Selection' in context menu?
Property.name: Clear Comparison Selection?

Property.description: Include 'Filter Selection' in context menu?
Property.name: Filter Selection?

Property.description: The text that prefixes 'lower limit' values in tooltips.
